$version.description: Version of this schema that should be used for validation.

source_url.description: URL where the image was initially found. Preferably a web page where the image was displayed but the URL the image was downloaded from is also acceptable.

source_id.description: Unique ID of the image on the platform it was downloaded from (such as guid in an RSS feed).

source_name.description: Name of a person or organization the image can be attributed to. Ideally the creator of the image but this could also be a publication.

access_date.description: Unix timestamp for when the image was downloaded.

tags.description: Additional information about the image that can be used for categorization or analysis.
